info.name: HTTP Missing Security Headers
author: socketz
geeknik
g4l1t0
convisoappsec
kurohost
dawid-czarnecki
info.description: It searches missing security headers, but obviously, could be so less generic and could be useless for Bug Bounty.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: arthur.lutz.im
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Security-Policy: upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Security-Policy-Report-Only: default-src https: data: 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' Content-Type: text/html Date: Mon, 13 Sep 2021 04:32:06 GMT Permissions-Policy: interest-cohort=() Server: nginx Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Sso-Wat: You've just been SSOed X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Arthur Lutz
  • Accueil
  • Sites
  • Comptes en ligne
  • Blog

Salut. Moi, c'est Arthur Lutz.

Voici une liste (forcément pas à jour) de ce que je fais (en partie) sur Internet. Pour l'ancienne page d'acceuil, voici son archive.

Cette page est auto-hébergée sur un petit serveur chez moi.

Quelques sites dont je m'occupe.

Mon blog, tout simplement. J'y partage et documente mes projets.
